___banner.description: Prefix the compressed source with the given banner, with a linebreak inbetween.

___report.description: Either report only minification result or report minification and gzip results. This is useful to see exactly how well clean-css is performing but using  'gzip'  will make the task take 5-10x longer to complete.

___keepSpecialComments.description: To keep or remove special comments, exposing the underlying option from 'clean-css'.
